answerText: IR spectroscopy or infrared spectroscopy[10] This area of an IR spectrum, occurring between 1500 and 500 inverse centimeters, gives a series of very complex peaks that can uniquely identify a molecule.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 13 - Finals 1 | 16 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Samples are prepared for this technique by dissolving them in chloroform and smearing between a pair of salt plates. For 10 points each: [10] Name this form of spectroscopy in which light with wavelengths longer than visual is used to probe vibrational modes of a molecule. Frequencies are plotted in inverse centimeters in this spectroscopy.
